Reviews.Content: hotel perfect tourist traveller wishes spend day night touring shopping experiencing excellent cuisine hotel facilities limited dont expect bigger hotel bar space reception roof top restaurant enclosed space baking hot morning breakfast breakfast adequate quick start day coffee poor positive note staff exceptionally friendly helpful clean comfortable little tired cant fault location outstanding rome outside sleep hotel
